name: Idocare
description: Idocare provides concentrated cleaning products that are 100% non-toxic, formulated from fully biodegradable ingredients; thus absolutely safe for people, pets and the environment. Products range from floor cleaner, dishwashing liquid to hand soap and all purpose spray.
